content: this legal text summarizes an agreement between three individuals referred to as am ag and ar regarding the division of ownership of certain real estate units in a building located in municipality numana the agreement states that the ownership will be divided into three equal shares with each individual being assigned specific units the value of each share is euro 144000 certain areas of the building such as the attic and courtyard will remain common among the coowners the agreement takes effect immediately and the parties declare their marital status and agree to share the expenses equally the text is signed by the parties and the notary
